resources.string: "You have no casters! Try adding some by tapping the \"+\" button in the lower right and get notifications when your favorite Vaughn casters are live!"

"It seems like you don't have Puffin Browser installed. Puffin Browser is a web browser for Android that supports Flash, which Vaughn Live uses. Would you like to install it?\nYou can also disable the use of Puffin Browser in the settings menu, which will open this link using your regular browser."

VL Notifier is not affiliated with VaughnSoft, and has been developed by Dandy Step as a third party.\nVaughn Live is the property of VaughnSoft.
